sentence: With the former president slow to issue an endorsement in the race a number of heavyweight candidates are actively jockeying for his support, including former state Treasurer Josh Mandel, entrepreneur and author JD Vance and former state GOP Chair Jane Timken.
author: Mychael Schnell
title: These Senate seats are up for election in 2022

sentence: With the former president slow to issue an endorsement in the race a number of heavyweight candidates are actively jockeying for his support, including former state Treasurer Josh Mandel, entrepreneur and author JD Vance and former state GOP Chair Jane Timken.
author: The Hill via Nexstar Media Wire
title: These Senate seats are up for election in 2022
